summary: A collection of unit tests that exercise EC2 network ACL operations using a mocked AWS environment. The tests cover creating ACLs, tagging, associating subnets, managing entries, and handling default ACL behavior, though many are currently unused or placeholders.
business_intent: Validate that EC2 network ACL functionality works as expected in a simulated AWS setting, ensuring correct creation, tagging, association, entry manipulation, and default behavior without incurring real cloud costs.
